text:
Dear All,
Hope you have been doing well! :sunflower: 
I have not been able to do much for the glossary package yet. But I am thinking of creating good first issues on the package repo so that you all might pick them up during the R Dev Day sessions at RSECon25. I also completely understand if you might be interested in contributing to something else during the R Dev Day!
